Production User Guide

Mar 14, 2023

This guide provides you with an overview of the contents for navigating through the production process. The guide is divided into three levels - Entry, Intermediate, and Advanced. Each with specific tasks that need to be performed.

Entry Level

  • Concluded Stops
  • XX Pass
  • Ad Group Inventory

Intermediate Level

  • Event Data Tool
  • Compiling XX Pass
  • - - Pass
  • Review Missed Ads
  • Clear Failed Forms

Advanced Level

  • Date Change
  • Display
  • Create Special Events
  • Additional Artists
  • Inventory Pass

Certain events in the production are handled separately to ensure they are not missed in the vast number of events...
